message: This proposal divides the funds 70% to me and 30% to you, Bob. It aims for a fair split considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to give you a smaller portion, but I still think this is a good starting point for the negotiation.

Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose a division where I receive 45% of the total and Bob receives 55%. This aims to balance fairness while acknowledging the inflationary pressures.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think this division is still too skewed in your favor. I'm hoping we can find a middle ground.
